          Bio üë©üèΩ‚Äçüî¨üë©üèΩ‚Äçüíª
          
          I am a PhD student in neuroscience working in the Neurogenesis & Neurodegeneration lab at the Netherlands Institute for Neuroscience üá≥üá±.  I am a molecular biologist by training, trying to dig into some single cell RNA-sequencing datasets (and having fun creating this website!). My main interests are adult hippocampal neurogenesis, Alzheimer‚Äôs disease and non-coding RNAs.
          
          ‚Ä¶Good food, good books, sports and fighting for human rights and a sustainable future make me happy.
          
          
          Publications
          
          Penning A,  Tosoni G , Abiega O, Bielefeld P, Gasperini C, De Pietri Tonell D, Fitzsimons C, Salta E. Adult Neural Stem Cell Regulation by Small Non-Coding RNAs: Physiological Significance and Pathological Implications. Front. Cell. Neurosci., 2022full text
          
          
          Walgrave H, Balusu S, Snoeck S, Vanden Eynden E, Craessaerts K, Thrupp N, Wolfs L, Horr√© K, Fourne Y, Ronisz A, Silajd≈æiƒá E, Penning A, Tosoni G, Callaerts-Vegh Z, D‚ÄôHooge R, Thal DR, Zetterberg H, Thuret S, Fiers M, Frigerio CS, De Strooper B, Salta E. Restoring miR-132 expression rescues adult hippocampal neurogenesis and memory deficits in Alzheimer‚Äôs disease. Cell Stem Cell, 2021full text
          
          
          Tosoni G, Conti M, Diaz Heijtz R. Bacterial peptidoglycans as novel signaling molecules from microbiota to brain. Curr Opin Pharmacol, 2019full text
